ComicInfo.Title: Graviton; A Gathering of Evil
ComicInfo.Summary:
Graviton: Graviton returns to our dimension and decides to find a consort by capturing Bloomindales.
A Gathering of Evil: Loki and Tyr begin a plan to gather all of Odin's greatest foes together to take over Asgard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:33:33. [Issue ID 36769]
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
ComicInfo.Characters: Jackie Gleason (as Joe the Bartender),cameo),Vision] (flashback,Thor,Judy Parks,Joe Parks,Graviton (villain),Avengers [Iron Man,The Wasp
